name: Oliver Plays The Labyrinth
description:
Oliver Plays The Labyrinth is a solo game prototype made for the 2020 GMTK GameJam. It is a top down/first person/third person puzzle game. Err, let me  explain.

Oliver is playing The Labyrinth in VR, and you are playing Oliver,  but not in VR.

Oliver Plays The Labyrinth takes you out of direct control over the game and makes you play as the player.

It's also about that feeling you have of things being out of control when you trip over furniture playing roomscale VR games.

But this is NOT a VR game. The Labyrinth is, which is what Oliver is playing... got it?

-----

100% of the game's code was written by me during the 48 hour GameJam.

Some art was created during the jam but much credit goes to:

morlockhater for the interior pixel art ( https://www.deviantart.com/morlockhater )
Patrick de Artega for music ( https://patrickdearteaga.com/chiptune-8-bit-retro/ )

Both will be featured in in-game credits when those are added.
